text:
When editing a value in Patterns to test, if we switch to another response assertion then value from previous Response Assertion sometimes take the value of the latter.
Another abnormal behaviour compared to other table elements in JMeter is that if we leave current Response Assertion value is not saved.
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
